text:
Basehor is a city in Leavenworth County, Kansas, United States. It is a suburb of the Kansas City Metropolitan Area. In 2010, 4,613 people lived there.
Geography.
Basehor is at (39.138469, −94.938735). The United States Census Bureau says that the city has a total area of. Of that, is land and is water.
2010 census.
The 2010 census says that there were 4,613 people, 1,751 households, and 1,337 families living in Basehor.
Education.
Basehor is served by USD 458 Basehor Linwood. The district high school is Basehor-Linwood High School located in Basehor.
